IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: INSURE THE CONTINUITY OF JEWISH LIFE IN CENTRAL NEW YORK INTO THE FUTURE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENSURE THE CONTINUITY AND VITALITY OF THE JEWISH COMMUNITY
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS AND RELATED EXPENSES TO PROVIDE INFORMATION ABOUT THE JEWISH COMMUNITY PHILANTHROPY

OtherSecuritiesGrp.Desc: VANGUARD TOTAL STOCK MARKET INDEX FUND

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR UNRESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS, DISTRIBUTIONS OF INCOME AND PRINCIPAL ARE MADE ACCORDING TO THE BYLAWS OF THE FOUNDATION ONLY TO THE SYRACUSE JEWISH FEDERATION UNLESS THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE FEDERATION CONSENTS TO A DISTRIBUTION TO ANOTHER CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION. FOR RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS, DISTRIBUTIONS ARE MADE FOLLOWING THE DIRECTIONS OF THE DONOR.

THE FOUNDATION COMPLIES WITH FASB ASC SUB-TOPIC 740-19, INCOME TAXES, WHICH REQUIRES THAT A TAX POSITION BE RECOGNIZED OR DERECOGNIZED BASED ON A MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THRESHOLD. THIS APPLIES TO POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN INCLUDING MAINTAINING TAX-EXEMPT STATUS. THE FOUNDATION BELIEVES ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS DO NOT INCLUDE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS OF AND FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30,2023. IT IS THE FOUNDATION'S POLICY TO RECOGNIZE ANY INTEREST AND PENALTIES IN THE FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES.
INCREASE IN CSV LIFE INSURANCE 3,686. INCREASE IN CHARITABLE GIFT ANNUITY 19,311. INCREASE IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER ANNUITY TRUST 8,742.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: AMERICAN FRIENDS OF MAGEN DAVID ADOM

AMERICAN HOME FURNISHINGS HALL OF FAME
LONGHOUSE COUNCIL BOY SCOUTS OF AMERICA
ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE AND RELATED DISORDERS ASSOCIATION INC
FRIENDS OF THE CENTRAL LIBRARY INC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION REQUIRES THAT ANY NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION RECEIVING A RESTRICTED GIFT PROVIDE A RECONCILIATION OF HOW THE FUNDS WERE SPENT. UNRESTRICTED GIFTS REQUIRE ONLY A NOTE FROM THE NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT THE FUNDS WERE RECEIVED. GIFTS MADE FROM DONOR-ADVISED FUNDS ARE SENT WITH A LETTER STATING THAT THE FUNDS ARE TO BE FULLY USED FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES ONLY AND IF APPLICABLE THE DONORS SUGGESTION FOR THE USE OF THE DONATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED WITH THE EXECUTIVE BOARD FIRST AND THEN PRESENTED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AT A QUARTERLY BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN AND SUBMIT SIGNED CONFLICTS OF INTEREST FORMS ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S SALARY IS 40% OF AN AMOUNT DETERMINED BY THE JEWISH FEDERATION UNDER A THREE-YEAR CONTRACT EXPIRING SEPTEMBER 2023.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON GUIDESTAR'S WEBSITE. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION SUCH AS THEIR GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE AT THE FOUNDATION'S OFFICE UPON REQUEST.
INCREASE IN CHARITABLE GIFT ANNUITIES 19,311. INCREASE IN CSV OF LIFE INSURANCE 3,686. INCREASE IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER ANNUITY TRUST 8,742.
THE AUDIT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE FOUNDATION ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
